name: Escape Skelt Dunjin 2
description:
The sequel to the fun little gamejam game "Escape Skelt Dunjin" the idea is the same. Find all the keys to the room, find the door, get as far as you can without letting the skeletons get to you.

Unlike last years version this game took longer than 2 days to make. This one took 2 weeks! So enjoy it, download and play for free! (Link Below)
